snippet: The Russian president visited the headquarters of the American and Canadian teams on Friday, part of his personal outreach at the Games.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir Putin visits the headquarters of the American and Canadian Olympic teams, part of his personal outreach effort to mend frosty relations with the West during Games.
lead_paragraph: The Russian president visited the headquarters of the American and Canadian teams on Friday, part of his personal outreach at the Games.

headline.main: U.S. and Canada Feel Putin Charm, Hockey Excluded
headline.print_headline: U.S. and Canada Feel Putin Charm, Hockey Excluded
